website_summaries.verdict: Trigger lock with an adjustable pin to fit your firearm and a cable lock for double protection.
pros: Locking system can be used 3 different ways
Easy to get into when you need the gun
Pin can be adjusted for a secure fit on your gun
Comes with a decoy lock to confuse kids
cons: This lock is wide and larger than most other trigger locks, which may may storage a challenge

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a CA approved gun lock and, due to the design of my rifle, the cable type locks that all the gunshops were selling would not work. It took a bit of fiddling to the get the pins set in a configuration that would work for my rifle -- but this is, again, due to the design of the rifle. One feature of this lock that makes it work for me is that it was possible to find a combination of pin locations that will prevent the trigger from being pulled when the lock is in place. In short, this lock was just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: James Thayer

customer_reviews.title: The best gun lock on the market!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderfully customizable with pins (some padded, some not) that fit in holes to secure the lock to your trigger guard, this unit also comes with a cable for use as a breech lock. The tumbler is individually keyed so you don't have to worry about someone else buying a lock and being able to access yours. The edges are rubber-coated so it won't scratch your finish, and the whole thing is designed so it is virtually impossible to open if you don't know what you're doing! Although it's a bit more expensive than other gun locks on the market, you won't be sorry you bought this one!
customer_reviews.author: MT Vessel

customer_reviews.title: Solid lock
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty solid. Doesn't even compare to the other cheaper locks out on the market. I bought this for more of a deterrent for unintentional firing of my firearm and not for theft. Fully customizable to fit your trigger very well and made not to damage the finish of your firearm. Pleased and will highly purchase another for my other firearms.
customer_reviews.author: Dvsjp79

customer_reviews.title: Best trigger lock on the market
customer_reviews.text: Best trigger lock on the market. Fits my Springfield XD-40 like a glove with the cool custom fit feature with the metal dowels. Easy to remove and easy to operate too!
customer_reviews.author: Manblinger

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This lock addresses BOTH safety and quick access to the firearm. They pulled off both of these criteria with stunning colors! Very solid product and an excellent design. I have a lot of confidence in it, and will buy it again (and highly recommend it).
customer_reviews.author: Quinn Edwards

customer_reviews.title: They work great and are easy to get into when you need ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these type of locks in the past. They work great and are easy to get into when you need to. For a home lock they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent trigger lock
customer_reviews.text: Excellent trigger lock. Works well, easy to use, and the ability to use it three different ways makes it a superior lock. That's why I now have two.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite Peaden

customer_reviews.title: good trigger lock.
customer_reviews.text: Took quite awhile to figure out the pin placement on my LC380... but it fits snugly without any movement. Would recommend if you're looking for the trigger lock that you can get into quickly without a key at night if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Yet Secure
customer_reviews.text: I use this specific lock on two shotguns. It has the great ability to keep kids and other curious people safe by disabling the trigger, yet has the ability to be quickly opened if you have the knowledge. Provides multiple layers to reduce access. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: TacomaKen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The hardest part about using one of these is getting it out of the packaging. Once out, it was a breeze to adapt a lock to each gun. Once you install the additional alignment pins, it's a solid deterrent to getting at the trigger. And using the cable significantly reduces the ability to actuate the receiver on those guns that have a path for the cable to pass through.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Gun Lock
customer_reviews.text: Great for securing a gun. Used to lock the trigger.
customer_reviews.author: HARRY EHEART

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adjusts, so can be very precise fit for particular firearm.
customer_reviews.author: Entity Entrant

customer_reviews.title: Fat pro-lok
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. A little fat and the first setting is too simple. It locks the trigger! Price a little high for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: This worked just like I was told it would
customer_reviews.text: This worked just like I was told it would. Had several people try to get it off the gun and they were unable. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: thz4him

customer_reviews.title: Best home defense trigger lock out there
customer_reviews.text: This trigger lock is the best on the market for home defense. I highly recommend it to those with kids that want to keep them out of danger but still want a fast access to their firearm should they find themselves in the hectic situation of a home invasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily Picked
customer_reviews.text: I watched a YouTube video where the reviewer was able to pick the key lock in 15 seconds. He states the wafer style lock used is at the bottom of the spectrum as far a security. However, for transporting a firearm to and from the range it would work well for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Person

product_meta.title: Pro-Lok Trigger Lock Ca Keyed Diff
product_meta.description: Pro Lock Trigger Gun Lock Keyed Diff/CA Apprvd GL650KD
feature_bullets: Pro Lock Trigger Lock CA Approved Keyed Differently
